text: Please bring back the SCALE_MODE_FIT_INSIDE scale mode. Currently I have to extend ToroVideoView, with custom Styleable attributes to get this achieved.
title: Please reintroduce SCALE_MODE_FIT_INSIDE

text: I will take a look. I disable it due to some shortage of time when I have to re-calculate the dimension. But originally I want the video to be nicely displayed. Stay tune.
